newsitem.title: USA: Suburban Lodges to speed up expansion plans.
newsitem.headline: Suburban Lodges to speed up expansion plans.

text.p: Suburban Lodges of America Inc said Wednesday it plans to accelerate expansion of its company-owned and franchised extended-stay hotels.
The company said it originally planned to open 54 facilities by the end of 1997. Now it said it anticipates having 65 facilities fully operational by the end of 1997.
A statement from the company said its high occupancy rates and rapid stabilization of new hotels show demand for more low-cost, extended stay lodgings.
